name: graphpc
description: Type-safe graph API for TypeScript. Like GraphQL, without the query language.
author: Carl Jackson

scripts.build: bun run build:server && bun run build:client && bun run build:eslint && bun run build:types
scripts.build:server: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external @typescript-eslint/utils --external devalue --external @standard-schema/spec
scripts.build:client: bun build src/client-entry.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external devalue --external @standard-schema/spec
scripts.build:eslint: bun build src/eslint/index.ts --outdir dist/eslint --target node --format esm --external @typescript-eslint/utils
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run typecheck && bun test
